channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Millennial U.K. lawyers are getting a $50,000 bonus for referring their friends to U.S. giants, despite the inevitable burnout
item.description: U.S. firms have rolled out massive referral bonuses after upping starting salaries to beyond $200,000.

item.title: Canada moves to end rail shutdown quickly; CN workers to return to work Friday
Nestle shares slump after abrupt departure of CEO
Starbucks’ incoming CEO Brian Niccol will immediately have more power than ousted boss Laxman Narasimhan
item.description: Only after an intense period of shadowing Howard Schultz did Laxman Narasimhan gain the ability to set the company’s strategy.

item.title: Friday's analyst calls: Warby Parker to rally more than 40%, Peloton downgraded
item.description: A glasses retailer and an exercise equipment maker were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Friday.

item.title: Kamala Harris promises an end to housing shortage in her ‘opportunity economy'
When it comes to crime, crypto is a powerful tool for law enforcement
item.description: Coinbase's Chief Security Officer makes a case for why law enforcement should prefer crypto to cash.

item.title: Nestle CEO departure seen as 'not such a bad thing' for investors, analyst says
item.description: Nestle has replaced its CEO Mark Schneider with company veteran Laurent Freixe in a bid to shake up its fortunes.

item.title: Kamala Harris accepts nomination from reinvigorated Democratic Party
Tokyo’s tax office is auctioning off a $390,000 Ferrari and a golf course
item.description: Tokyo's tax agency seized a 2-seater Ferrari NV 488 Pista Spider with an estimated price of 56.8 million yen ($390,000) from an owner who failed to pa...

item.title: World’s second-largest diamond discovered in Botswana
item.description: One of the largest diamonds ever to be excavated was found in Botswana at a mine owned by Canadian firm Lucara Diamond.

item.title: Why Target’s closure of crime-prone stores may result in future ‘retail deserts’
Nestle CEO Mark Schneider steps down after steering the ship for eight years—to be replaced by Latin American boss
item.description: The Nespresso coffee capsules and Haagen-Dazs ice cream manufacturer lowered its sales growth outlook for 2024 last month as it slowed its price incre...

item.title: Trump's Arizona trip keeps immigration front-and-center, as Democrats sharpen border messaging
item.description: Donald Trump has used the border as a primary line of attack against Vice President Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden.

item.title: Podcast: We're not in a recession, but you can still plan for one
